text: 6|68|Ara apani yakhana taderake dekhena, yara amadera ayatasamuha sambad'dhe upahasamulaka alocanaya magna haya, takhana apani tadera theke mukha phiriye nibena, ye paryanta na tara an'ya prasanga suru kare [1]. Ara sayatana yadi apanake bhuliye deya tabe smarana ha'oyara para yalima sampradayera sathe basabena na [2].
